org.springdata.cassandra.cql.config
Class KeyspaceAttributes

java.lang.Object
  org.springdata.cassandra.cql.config.KeyspaceAttributes

public class KeyspaceAttributes
extends Object

Keyspace attributes are used to create/validate or drop keyspace on startup.

Author:
Alex Shvid
